values: Pain is the feeling that you have when you are hurt.
His head was full of pain.
n. 疼痛；努力 vt. 使…痛苦；使…烦恼 vi. 感到疼痛；引起疼痛

疼痛, 痛苦, 痛, 伤痛 (noun.)
n .痛苦，疼痛；vt .使痛苦；<衍生词>  painfu l adj.疼痛的，使痛苦的

To pain is to cause physical or emotional discomfort or suffering.
Pain is an unpleasant physical sensation or discomfort in the body.
